content: I think he'll figure it out, but I think that is a good way to start off with a new chat so like they get this is something different which also drives more energy. If you're good, I'm good, just want to ask what do you think the best way for him to do this is, like what format? An artifact or cat commands? He's only got probably 70% of the content now too, so I want to remind him of that so he paces himself. I guess if he goes over though, can always take another pass and tighten it up. Do you think there is anything you want to add about citing the different files so they can be accessed in full if needed? Or if you don't think that will be needed, that's fine too. Let me know.
